description:
The VMware compute driver options.  

These are properties specific to compute drivers.  For a list of all hypervisors, see here: https://wiki.openstack.org/wiki/HypervisorSupportMatrix.

vmware_adaptertype.title: Disk Adapter Type
vmware_adaptertype.description: The virtual SCSI or IDE controller used by the hypervisor.

vmware_ostype.title: OS Type
vmware_ostype.description: A VMware GuestID which describes the operating system installed in the image. This value is passed to the hypervisor when creating a virtual machine. If not specified, the key defaults to otherGuest. See thinkvirt.com.
